## Title generation

Please generate title from commit message if there is one commit.
Please generate title according to the following guidelines if there are multiple commits:

- **Language**: Write commit messages in English.
- **Clarity**: Clearly and concisely explain what was changed and why the change was necessary.
- **Consistency**: Follow the Angular Commit Message Convention (https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/).

## Description generation

- Please generate description according to the following template.
  Please don't remove `Asana Link:`.
  Please generate `Changes`, `Test case`.

  ```
  <!-- Please refer to https://www.notion.so/nearmejp/Conventions-45899760b96a43dca54b3d251eabff85 for how to write each section. -->

  ## ğŸ¯ Goal / Background <!-- Required -->

  Asana Link:

  ## ğŸ”§ Changes <!-- Optional -->

  ## â˜‘ï¸ Test case <!-- Required -->
  ```
